mapper.sql: id, examination_task_id, stu_id, examining_hostIP, examining_login_time, examining_remain_time, examining_state, examining_state_switch_time, `valid`, memo, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by
mapper.select: SELECT uset.id, uset.examination_task_id, uset.stu_id, uset.examining_hostIP, uset.examining_login_time, uset.examining_remain_time, uset.examining_state, uset.examining_state_switch_time, uset.valid, uset.memo, uset.create_time, uset.create_by, uset.update_time, uset.update_by, us.stu_name, us.stu_number FROM u_student_examination_task uset INNER JOIN u_student us ON uset.stu_id = us.id AND us.valid = 1 WHERE uset.valid = 1 AND uset.id = #{id}

SELECT max(everyTotalScore) AS highestScore, min(everyTotalScore) AS lowestScore, avg(everyTotalScore) AS averageScore FROM ( SELECT uset.id, sum(uer.student_score) everyTotalScore FROM u_student_examination_task uset LEFT JOIN u_examination_result uer ON uset.id = uer.examining_id AND uer.valid = 1 WHERE uset.valid = 1 AND uset.examining_state = 2 AND uset.examination_task_id = #{examinationTaskId} GROUP BY uset.id ) AS examination_result_count
SELECT examining_state AS resultType, count(1) AS stuNumber FROM u_student_examination_task WHERE valid = 1 AND examination_task_id = #{examinationTaskId} GROUP BY examining_state
SELECT id FROM u_student_examination_task WHERE valid = 1 AND examination_task_id = #{examinationTaskId} AND examining_state = 2

SELECT uset.id, coalesce(sum(uer.student_score), 0) AS stuTotalScore FROM u_student_examination_task uset INNER JOIN u_examination_result uer ON uset.id = uer.examining_id AND uer.valid = 1 WHERE uset.valid = 1 AND uset.examining_state = 2 AND uset.examination_task_id = #{examinationTaskId} GROUP BY uset.id ORDER BY stuTotalScore DESC
